Nexus.Deferred
Nexus.invokeAfter(Class<T> eclass, long delay, Action<? super T> action)

 Nexus.Deferred Nexus.Deferred.repeatEvery(long period)
          Causes this deferred action to repeat every period millis after its first invocation, until canceled.
